programme.desc: Laura Hamilton meets retired couple Denise Grahame and Roger Denis, who met three years ago, and developed a shared love for Bretagne culture. Moving to Brittany, the pair took up residence in a rented property near the town of Callac, but are now seeking to buy a place of their own. Laura is tasked with seeking out suitable homes within their budget of £120,000, and picks out five rural abodes she believes might fit the bill.(n)

programme.title: Homes by the Med
programme.desc: In Mallorca, Charlie Luxton travels to the cliffs near Port Adriano and a home carved in the rocks. He also visits a once run-down villa that has been turned into a holiday retreat, and the opulent Villa Colani. His final stop this week is to VIlla Kerida, which boasts 360-degree views, and private access directly to the sea.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: After recovering from a life-threatening brain haemorrhage, Bram Vis, his wife Lisa and their two children want to build a house for sharing on a seaside plot on the Isle of Wight. Kevin McCloud follows the family's progress as they build an ambitious home complete with entertaining spaces and a swimming pool. However, the sheer scale of their project soon becomes clear when their original £850k budget spirals out of control.(n)

programme.title: Great Canal Journeys
programme.desc: Timothy West and Prunella Scales conclude the series by travelling down the Stratford-upon-Avon Canal, accompanied by Tim's daughter and her family. The couple revisit places that hold fond memories from the early stages of their relationship, as well as looking back on the beginnings of their acting careers and putting on a performance in the church where Shakespeare is buried. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence.(n)
